All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AmericanSize
Represents American clothing sizes.
App
Entry point of the application.
Clothes
Represents a piece of clothing with basic attributes such as color, type, European size, and American size.
ClothesFactory
Factory class for creating Clothes objects via console input.
ClothesType
Represents different types of clothes.
Hat
Represents a Hat item.
HatType
Represents types of hat
Pants
Represents a Pants item.
Shirt
Represents a Shirt item.
Skirt
Represents a Skirt item.
SkirtLength
Represents different lengths of skirts.
SleeveLength
Represents sleeve length for shirts
